name: Ukraine
startIntroPart1: Wise and noble Yaroslav, Grand Prince of Kyiv, your people honor you! Under your reign, Kyivan Rus reached its golden age, becoming one of medieval Europe's largest and most prosperous states. Through your wisdom, you codified laws, promoted education, and built magnificent architectural wonders like the Saint Sophia Cathedral. Your diplomatic marriages connected Kyivan Rus with the great European houses, earning you the title 'the Father-in-law of Europe'.
startIntroPart2: Great Prince Yaroslav, your people call for your wisdom once again. Will you guide Ukraine to new heights of cultural and diplomatic achievement? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: For the defense of our homeland, we must take up arms. Prepare for battle!
attacked: You dare attack the descendants of Kyivan Rus? You will regret this decision!
defeated: Though you may occupy our lands, you cannot break our spirit. Ukraine's flame will never die.
introduction: Greetings! I am Yaroslav, Grand Prince of Kyiv. May wisdom guide our relations.
afterPeace: Let wisdom prevail over warfare. May this peace endure.
tradeRequest: A fair trade strengthens both parties. Consider this proposal.
